alert.note: Alert for Jasper (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 15 at 2:01PM CDT until May 18 at 10:26AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Springfield MO has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Missouri... Spring River at Carthage affecting Jasper County. .Heavy rainfall on already saturated ground will lead to the Spring River rising above flood stage at Carthage. Details are included below. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO LATE THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Spring River at Carthage. * WHEN...From this evening to late Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, minor flooding occurs at the gage site. Flood waters impact State Highway 37 east of Carthage between Avilla and Reeds. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:45 PM CDT Monday the stage was 6.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 12.0 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
